title: Skin Suggestions - Phoenix Anivia
body:
I suggest that Riot create a Phoenix Anivia (in series with Phoenix Quinn), this is how I'd envision her changes:

  Passive: Her egg would be red and cindering, similar Quinn's death animation.
  Q: Anivia would look like fire, similar to Brand's ultimate.
  W: Anivia would create a molten-rock wall, similar to Warring Kingdom's Jarvan IV's Cataclysm 
  E: Anivia would send out a flaming spike, I don't have any comparisons.
  R: Anivia would create an AoE of a fire-like material, with ashes in the air instead of snow-flakes.

What do you think about the skin?
P.S. If you're going to pull out the 'But the skin doesn't match her ability icons' card, then why did they release the likes of Cryocore Brand?

replies.body: There's no 'No, Yes' option. I don't want this skin but I'd probably end up buying it anyway.
I'll add that option in my future posts, I didn't add it because it sounded counter-intuitive and I can't edit it in because you can't edit polls.
